Detailed Description

Representation of result set field.

Note:
odbc::field_impl is Copyable, NON inheritable and NOT direct constructable
Remarks:
You must not create objects of this class directly but instead invoke statement::field() to get one. You must not keep the objects for more than directly calling one of its members, see statement::field() for more details on this.
